metadata.name: REPETAE: HUE HAIKU
metadata.description:
This generative ars poetica invokes the indigo debate to consider the relationship between language and perception. Part of Stilesâ€™ ongoing REPETAE series, which explores algorithmic recursion as a fundamental poetic technique.

*
Indigofera
muse brews dye, true hues too blue
for the human eye.
